price: Do they not see the things that Allah has created, how their shadows incline to the right and left, prostrating[29] to Allah in all humility?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ مَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٖ يَتَفَيَّؤُاْ ظِلَٰلُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَٱلشَّمَآئِلِ سُجَّدٗا لِّلَّهِ وَهُمۡ دَٰخِرُونَ
footnotes: [29] Prostration is the greatest sign of submission to Allah.
